data.text: @lovelyr62759593 Awesome, that's what we like to hear, Lovely. We strive to provide an excellent customer service and appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback. Kindly DM us your PNR so we may share your words with our team. Stay #RedHotSpicy 😀https://t.co/Qi2laHz2Nw
@SourishC16 Sourish, you are welcome!
@SourishC16 Hi Sourish, ghee is not allowed to be carried in the checked-in baggage or hand baggage.
@karunanundy You're welcome! We've replied to your DM.

@karunanundy Please be assured, we shall relay the feedback to the concerned head. Further, so great to hear Ms Bornali and the other crew member left such a positive impression! We shall share your words with our team.
@adityabenwal Hi Aditya, we shall respond to your DM shortly.
@shubhamkukkar Hi Shubham, kindly initiate a DM so we may assist you. https://t.co/Qi2laHz2Nw

@PriyankaKajla59 If the passport has a first name only and the visa has been issued with more than a first name or full name. Please note that passengers having the father's name or family name on the second page will be accepted.

@rashminiraj19 Hi Rashmi, as checked, you were carrying 21 kg excess hand baggage. Please note that charges are applicable in case of excess baggage as per our terms of carriage.
@karunanundy Kindly be assured, we shall share the feedback with our team for necessary review and action. The flight shall depart soon. Please connect with our staff for any assistance.

Our 'Lal Mirch' looking a little extra spicy. Watch it up, close and personal. Thank you for this spectacular capture Jeevan Patnaik.

#spicejet #redhotspicy #myspicylife #addspicetoyourlife  #traveladdict #aviationphotography #aviationlovers #sunrise #wanderlust #follow #like https://t.co/A78f7uCVrH

https://t.co/UMdB9m2v7X
@mayank_2045 You're welcome! Unfortunately, we would not be able to process your request for changes without charges.

urls.title: SpiceJet - Flight Booking for Domestic and International, Cheap Air Tickets
urls.description: SpiceJet, India’s favorite domestic airline, cheap air tickets flight booking to 46 cities across India and international destinations. Experience low cost air travel with the best in-class comfort, fares and baggage allowance.

data.text: @mayank_2045 Hi Mayank, please note that a change fee with fare difference (if any) shall be applicable on changes. You may proceed with changes via the manage booking option on our website https://t.co/iQhxtfVkkj or through the travel agency from which the booking was made.

data.text: @ani_hy However, a valid UAE residence visa holder with emirates ID in possession with a single name is passport is exempted and shall be allowed to enter and travel from UAE presently. 2/2

@ani_hy Hi Anirudh, please note, passengers with a single name on his/her passport will not be accepted To and From UAE until they change their passports as per the requirement (Reference ICAO Document 9303 on Machine Readable Travel Document, Ed 18,2021). 1/2
@sivateja02 Hi Siva, we’ve changed the title for the passenger as per your request and sent the updated itinerary to the registered email id.

@sharmaritesh08 Hi Ritesh, please DM us so we may share the details with you. 

https://t.co/UMdB9lKlTP
@LGhanshyam16 Ghanshyam, please note, liquids up to 100 ml shall be allowed in cabin baggage.
@LGhanshyam16 Ghanshyam, please note, you can carry up to 5 liters in your check-in baggage.

data.text: #WeatherUpdate: Due to bad weather in Darbhanga (DBR), all departures/arrivals and their consequential flights may get affected. Passengers are requested to keep a check on their flight status via https://t.co/VkU7yLjZly.
@LGhanshyam16 Hi Ghanshyam, we shall check and get back to you with an update. We request your patience.
@helpmeuber88 Sid, we shall get back to you with an update soon. We request your patience.
@helpmeuber88 Hi Sid, please allow us some time to check with our team, we shall get back to you with an update.
@gauravnehra1 Hi Gaurav, auto check-in is done for the PNR. The boarding pass shall be shared on your registered Email ID shortly. We request your patience.
